channel.title: Staff Member's don't drop in pking?
channel.description:
Well, I know this is a noob question and all, but when admins,owners, and mods don't drop items when they die in pking. (Not sure if mods don't drop too but I'm guessing. Is there any way I could enable the drops or something?
Thanks for any help in advance

item.title: Staff Member's don't drop in pking?
item.dc:creator: @guitar9000 guitar9000
item.description:
@guitar9000 wrote:

any other ideas?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2009, 02:33:20 pm[/size][hr]THANKS FOR HELP BUT I FIxXED!
